channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google pays $68M to settle claims its voice assistant spied on users
item.description: Google did not admit wrongdoing in the settlement of the class-action case, which accused the firm of "unlawful and intentional interception and recor...

item.title: South Korea’s Edenlux set for U.S. debut of eye-strain wellness device
item.description: Edenlux builds wearable tech to protect and train your eyes, inspired by its founder’s personal vision recovery.

item.title: Northwood Space secures a $100M Series B and a $50M Space Force contract
item.description: This is the El Segundo, California-based startup's second raise in less than a year.

item.title: Qualcomm backs SpotDraft to scale on-device contract AI with valuation doubling toward $400M
item.description: SpotDraft now processes over 1 million contracts annually using its AI tool, with contract volumes up 173% year-over-year.

item.title: ‘Among the worst we’ve seen’: report slams xAI’s Grok over child safety failures
item.description: “We assess a lot of AI chatbots at Common Sense Media, and they all have risks, but Grok is among the worst we’ve seen,” Robbie Torney of Common Sense...

item.title: The 10 Best Sleep Masks We’ve Tested While Snoozing (2026)
item.description: Get some solid shut-eye with the help of these sleep masks. Our top pick is from Blissy.

item.title: Rad Power Bikes reaches deal to sell itself for $13.2M
item.description: A company called Life Electric Vehicle Holdings has emerged as the top bidder for Rad Power's assets. It's not clear what the company plans to do with...

item.title: Here’s the tech powering ICE’s deportation crackdown
item.description: From phone spyware and facial recognition to phone unlocking technology and databases and more, this tech powers Trump's deportation machine.

item.title: Redditors Are Mounting a Resistance Against ICE
item.description: A user from r/Minneapolis was among the first to share footage of federal agents shooting Alex Pretti. Following his death, subreddits about football,...

item.title: Social network UpScrolled sees surge in downloads following TikTok’s US takeover
item.description: UpScrolled is a social network that pledges to remain impartial to political agendas. It blends familiar features from Instagram and X, letting users ...
